comment: Great instructor. She knows her stuff and how its relevant in the real corporate world. Listen and participate in the lectures, ask questions, and do the work and you will get an A.
Dr. Earnshaw is an amazing professor who really cares about her students. She is extremely understanding and wants the best for everyone. Just show up to class and do the work and you will pass.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback
